column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So happy my husband and I had our anniversary dinner here! We were skeptical at first
column2: but it met and exceeded our expectations. The dim lighting
column4: and candle lit table made it feel extra special. We ordered the oysters
column6: two filet mignon (one bone in one without)
column8: and sweet potato. Everything was OUT OF THIS WORLD! Pro tip- order the roasted garlic with your steak!
